In this way, if a person sincerely recites, pays homage, remembers, or listens to these one hundred and eight names in the early morning, they will attain the most supreme auspicious blessings and merits, and all their afflictions and evil karma will quickly be purified, they will not undergo rebirth, and will attain liberation until they become Buddhas.
I now recite and pay homage to these names of the Muni's merits,
And universally dedicate them to all beings, so that they may attain the fruit of enlightenment together.
